descriptions.title: Project description
paragraphs: We are searching for a skilled and enthusiastic person to join our international team. You will be integrated into US based web hosting company. As a cloud system engineer you will participate in enhancements stability of the company critical infrastructure.

descriptions.title: Required skills
paragraphs: 3+ years deploying and managing Linux operating system environments.
3+ years of hands-on networking experience including functional knowledge of HTTP, DNS, TCP/IP, BGP,
OSPF and related networking protocols and technologies.
Experience with OpenStack, including prior contributions, blueprints.
Expert knowledge in Python.
Experience with virtualization, preferably KVM.

descriptions.title: As a plus
paragraphs: OpenStack community involvement is a big plus.
Experience with hosting companies.
Experience with Perl language.

descriptions.title: We offer
paragraphs: Possibility to work remotely or from office in Odesa.
Five-day work-week within young and energetic team
Paid vacation — 22 working days per year
Competitive salary, yearly reviewed, possibilities of growth
Business trips to customer (Los Angeles) once a year.

descriptions.title: Responsibilities
paragraphs: Be a contributor on our cloud team, helping build and operate our cloud platform.
Contribute upstream changes to OpenStack, including bug fixes, new features, and blueprints, along with being a significant participant in the community.
Exhibit a strong passion for developing cloud scale software.

descriptions.title: Responsibilities
paragraphs: Assist in the design and enhancements to existing applications, software, and operating systems.
Collaborate with engineering staff to ensure smooth and reliable operation of software and systems for fulfilling business objectives and processes.

Assist in the design and perform server and security audits, system backup procedures, and other recovery processes in accordance with the company’s disaster recovery and business continuity strategies.

descriptions.title: Project description
paragraphs: We are looking for a User Interface / User Experience Designer of different levels to join our international creative team. You will be a part of a team designing products for a US-based hosting company, DreamHost LLC. As a UI/UX designer, you will take a part of the entire process of design: user flow, wireframe, prototype, and pixel perfect final design for the modern web & mobile applications.

descriptions.title: Required skills
paragraphs: At least 3+ years of experience designing user interfaces for web & mobile applications
Expertise in Adobe products, InVision or other wireframe & prototyping tool
Passion for elegant and intuitive user interfaces with ability to balance different points of view.
Understanding of modern web technologies & platforms: Single Page Web Applications, Android, iOS
Effective verbal and written communication skills are a must as you will work in a team environment.

descriptions.title: As a plus
paragraphs: Experience with AGILE methodologies is a plus working with other teams via JIRA.

paragraphs: Five-day work week within a young and energetic team.

Large international projects
Flexible working schedule
Competitive pay reviewed each six months, a lot of possibilities to grow.

descriptions.title: Responsibilities
paragraphs: Assess functional requirements while understanding the business needs & customer expectations
Produce user flows, wireframes, prototypes, and final design in Photoshop as deliverables for the technology team for all platforms

Conduct user experience research to improve existing and new applications
